text: ineziya yekadutimi bezihi k’uri’ani beziya kebefitu balewimi (mets’ihafi) bech’irashi anaminimi alu፡፡ bedayochimi kefilachewi wede kefilu nigigirini yemimelalesu honewi begetachewi zenidi bemik’omu gize bitayi noro፤ (asidenak’ini negeri tayi neberi)፡፡ ineziya yetewareduti le’ineziya lekoruti «inanite balineberachihu noro amanyochi behoni neberi» yilalu፡፡
